thread.title_full: Teenager who murdered Sydney cop Peter Forsyth is released | Daily Mail Online

author: Sinead Maclaughlin For Daily Mail Australia
title: Teenager who murdered Sydney cop Peter Forsyth is released | Daily Mail Online
text: Teenager who brutally murdered Sydney policeman Peter Forsyth has a CHILD with his prison psychologist - after killer married her when he was released from jail nine years early Murray Hearne, now 37, was 18 when he murdered police officer Peter Forsyth The teenager approached Forsyth and two other officers to sell them drugs Hearne fatally stabbed the father-of-two and seriously wounded Jason Semple He served 16-years in jail where he met prison psychologist Bobbie Bergmeier The convicted killer now lives in Wagga Wagga with his wife and their baby son Published: 19:10 GMT, 14 February 2017 | Updated: 02:12 GMT, 15 February 2017 311 shares
